name: Teeth Cleaning
description: All the more reason to not only maintain your teeth, but also your gums, because brushing alone will not get you there. An appointment for a teeth cleaning treatment offers the perfect solution for this.

name: Dental Implants
description: Implants form the root of a crown,  of click denture. A dental implant is actually an artificial root of a tooth which replaces the original absent root.

name: Regular treatments
description: During the checkup, the dentist can detect a cavity, inflammation . The dentist will discuss the follow-up treatment with you in advance and in This gives you peace of mind and you know exactly where you stand.
